an3.155:1: "Ye, bhikkhave, sattā pubbaṇhasamayaṁ kāyena sucaritaṁ caranti, vācāya sucaritaṁ caranti, manasā sucaritaṁ caranti, supubbaṇho, bhikkhave, tesaṁ sattānaṁ.
an3.155:2: Ye, bhikkhave, sattā majjhanhikasamayaṁ kāyena sucaritaṁ caranti, vācāya sucaritaṁ caranti, manasā sucaritaṁ caranti, sumajjhanhiko, bhikkhave, tesaṁ sattānaṁ.
an3.155:3: Ye, bhikkhave, sattā sāyanhasamayaṁ kāyena sucaritaṁ caranti, vācāya sucaritaṁ caranti, manasā sucaritaṁ caranti, susāyanho, bhikkhave, tesaṁ sattānanti.
an3.155:4: Sunakkhattaṁ sumaṅgalaṁ,suppabhātaṁ suhuṭṭhitaṁ;Sukhaṇo sumuhutto ca,suyiṭṭhaṁ brahmacārisu.
an3.155:5: Padakkhiṇaṁ kāyakammaṁ,vācākammaṁ padakkhiṇaṁ;Padakkhiṇaṁ manokammaṁ,paṇīdhi te padakkhiṇe;Padakkhiṇāni katvāna,labhantatthe padakkhiṇe.
an3.155:6: Te atthaladdhā sukhitā,viruḷhā buddhasāsane;Arogā sukhitā hotha,saha sabbehi ñātibhī"ti.
an3.155:7: Akusalañca sāvajjaṁ,visamāsucinā saha;Caturo khatā vandanā,pubbaṇhena ca te dasāti.
